title: U.S. consumers who use marijuana 2019 , by age group
summary: who gaming is no longer a hobby exclusively enjoyed by the young .
As generations have grown up with who games a normal part of life , the U.S. of the average gamer also increases .
While 22 % of who use marijuana still come from the 18-29_years to 30-49_years U.S. demographic , some 3 % are 65+_years 18-29_years and 65+_years .
gold: Eighteen to twenty-nine-year-olds were the largest group of current marijuana smokers in the United States in 2019.
Roughly a quarter of the age group were current smokers , with usage dipping among older age groups.
Seniors were the least likely , with only three percent stating that they were current smokers .
